author: PatagonianCoyhaique
title: Friendly place in a great location
text:
It was my first time in this hotel and I was surprised by the warmth of the staff from the moment we arrived throughout all of our stay. They were genuinely interested in helping us make the best of our experience, providing helpful tips and directions to nearby restaurants and grocery stores, etc.
The location is very convenient-- walking distance of Central Park, museums, healthcare centers, shops, etc.
The room (junior suite) was spacious, spotless, very quiet, great shower, and a very nice cozy bed-- they even give you a choice of pillows!
Room Tip: Rooms that face 64th street are quieter See more room tips Green Features: They have the standard on-demand sheet and towel change and they also promote the use of tap water, which is safe and saves a lot of resources.
